column2: "What's gotten into you? There's no way that enemy is a threat to us in that state."
"Hm... Looks like everything here has already been taken out as well. Looks like someone got here before us."
"Forgive me, Theodore, I had intended this to be a test of your new powers. It seems that will need to wait."
"No need for concern on my part. More importantly, should I do that here as well?"
"By all means."
"Splendid. In that state, there's no way to extract any considerable amount of data."
"Would you like me to blow the entire thing to pieces?"
"No need to go to such lengths. Honestly, it's not even essential to destroy it at all."
"It doesn't matter what they investigate or discover, there's nothing ARKS can do."
"Well, aside from dancing around in the palm of my hand."
"Going to the extent of taking away their ability to dance would make this exercise rather boring."
"The data is complete. It's already too late, so I find their futile attempts to resist so very amusing."
"I don't completely understand..."
"In time, you will. Let's go, shall we?"
"That was a close call..."
"My apologies, but I have no intention of dancing in your palm. While you're laughing, we'll take you down."
"But one thing I don't understand. That ARKS with him definitely wasn't Clarrisa Kliess, so who was it?"
"It poses a problem if we have to confront him as an enemy sometime in the future."
"Simply being used and then thrown away when not needed, we need to break that cycle."
"For it to happen to me is already..."
"Forget I said anything just now."
"I wonder if there's any way to emancipate him from Luther's grasp."
"A Grasp Beyond The Haze "
"第4章\u3000霞の先で掴むもの"
